tool.name: TextExporter
tool.description: Exports various XML formats to a text file.
tool.command:
TextExporter
#if $param_in: -in $param_in #end if #if $param_out: -out $param_out #end if #if $param_separator: -separator "$param_separator" #end if #if $param_replacement: -replacement "$param_replacement" #end if #if $param_quoting: -quoting #if " " in str($param_quoting): "$param_quoting" #else $param_quoting #end if #end if #if $param_no_ids: -no_ids #if " " in str($param_no_ids): "$param_no_ids" #else $param_no_ids #end if #end if #if $param_feature_minimal: -feature:minimal #if " " in str($param_feature_minimal): "$param_feature_minimal" #else $param_feature_minimal #end if #end if #if $param_feature_add_metavalues: -feature:add_metavalues $param_feature_add_metavalues #end if #if $param_id_proteins_only: -id:proteins_only #if " " in str($param_id_proteins_only): "$param_id_proteins_only" #else $param_id_proteins_only #end if #end if #if $param_id_peptides_only: -id:peptides_only #if " " in str($param_id_peptides_only): "$param_id_peptides_only" #else $param_id_peptides_only #end if #end if #if $param_id_first_dim_rt: -id:first_dim_rt #if " " in str($param_id_first_dim_rt): "$param_id_first_dim_rt" #else $param_id_first_dim_rt #end if #end if #if $param_id_add_metavalues: -id:add_metavalues $param_id_add_metavalues #end if #if $param_id_add_hit_metavalues: -id:add_hit_metavalues $param_id_add_hit_metavalues #end if #if $param_consensus_centroids: -consensus:centroids $param_consensus_centroids #end if #if $param_consensus_elements: -consensus:elements $param_consensus_elements #end if #if $param_consensus_features: -consensus:features $param_consensus_features #end if #if $param_consensus_sorting_method: -consensus:sorting_method #if " " in str($param_consensus_sorting_method): "$param_consensus_sorting_method" #else $param_consensus_sorting_method #end if #end if #if $param_consensus_sort_by_maps: -consensus:sort_by_maps #if " " in str($param_consensus_sort_by_maps): "$param_consensus_sort_by_maps" #else $param_consensus_sort_by_maps #end if #end if #if $param_consensus_sort_by_size: -consensus:sort_by_size #if " " in str($param_consensus_sort_by_size): "$param_consensus_sort_by_size" #else $param_consensus_sort_by_size #end if #end if #if $adv_opts.adv_opts_selector=='advanced': #if $adv_opts.param_force: -force #if " " in str($adv_opts.param_force): "$adv_opts.param_force" #else $adv_opts.param_force #end if #end if #end if

param.name: param_separator
param.label: The used separator character(s); if not set the 'tab' character is used

param.name: param_replacement
param.label: Used to replace occurrences of the separator in strings before writing, if 'quoting' is 'none'

param.name: param_quoting
param.label:
Method for quoting of strings: 'none' for no quoting, 'double' for quoting with doubling of embedded quotes,
'escape' for quoting with backslash-escaping of embedded quotes

param.name: param_feature_minimal
param.label: Set this flag to write only three attributes: RT, m/z, and intensity

param.name: param_feature_add_metavalues
param.label: Add columns for meta values which occur with a certain frequency (0-100%)
param.help: (-add_metavalues) Set to -1 to omit meta values (default)

param.name: param_id_proteins_only
param.label: Set this flag if you want only protein information from an idXML file

param.name: param_id_peptides_only
param.label: Set this flag if you want only peptide information from an idXML file

param.name: param_id_first_dim_rt
param.label: If this flag is set the first_dim RT of the peptide hits will also be printed (if present)

param.name: param_id_add_metavalues
param.label: Add columns for meta values which occur with a certain frequency (0-100%)
param.help: (-add_metavalues) Set to -1 to omit meta values (default)

param.name: param_id_add_hit_metavalues
param.label: Add columns for meta values which occur with a certain frequency (0-100%)
param.help: (-add_hit_metavalues) Set to -1 to omit meta values (default)

param.name: param_consensus_sorting_method
param.label: Sorting options can be combined
param.help: (-sorting_method) The precedence is: sort_by_size, sort_by_maps, sorting_method

param.name: param_consensus_sort_by_maps
param.label: Apply a stable sort by the covered maps, lexicographically

param.name: param_consensus_sort_by_size
param.label: Apply a stable sort by decreasing size (i.e., the number of elements)

tool.help:
Exports various XML formats to a text file.
For more information, visit http://ftp.mi.fu-berlin.de/OpenMS/release-documentation/html/TOPP_TextExporter.html
